Sentence.value: Consider letting your co-workers know you have cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Consider letting your co-[[workers|C1527116]] know you have [[cancer|C0006826]].

Sentence.value: Some people may have an emotional reaction to the news.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Some [[people|C0027361]] may have an [[emotional reaction|C0221736]] to the news.
